name: Validate book creation with invalid pages values
scenarioId: BooksAPIOperations:Validate book creation with invalid pages values
methodName: Validate book creation with invalid pages values

testSteps.description: 1: Validate book creation with invalid pages values ({name=Book A, author=Author A, publication=Publisher A, category=Fiction, pages=P220, price=20.50})

children.description:
Given User tries to create a book with the following details:
| name | author | publication | category | pages | price |
| Book A | Author A | Publisher A | Fiction | P220 | 20.50 |
When User submits the request to create a book
